member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.FileBufferingReadStream
member.summary: A Stream that wraps another stream and enables rewinding by buffering the content as it is read. The content is buffered in memory up to a certain size and then spooled to a temp file on disk. The temp file will be deleted on Dispose.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.FormReader
member.summary: Used to read an 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' form.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.FormReader.ValueCountLimit
member.summary: The limit on the number of form values to allow in ReadForm or ReadFormAsync.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.FormReader.KeyLengthLimit
member.summary: The limit on the length of form keys.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.FormReader.ValueLengthLimit
member.summary: The limit on the length of form values.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.FormReader.ReadNextPair
member.summary: Reads the next key value pair from the form. For unbuffered data use the async overload instead.
member.returns: The next key value pair, or null when the end of the form is reached.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.FormReader.ReadNextPairAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously reads the next key value pair from the form.
member.returns: The next key value pair, or null when the end of the form is reached.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.FormReader.ReadForm
member.summary: Parses text from an HTTP form body.
member.returns: The collection containing the parsed HTTP form body.

member.summary: Parses an HTTP form body.
member.param: The .
member.returns: The collection containing the parsed HTTP form body.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.HttpResponseStreamWriter
member.summary: Writes to the using the supplied . It does not write the BOM and also does not close the stream.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.HttpResponseStreamWriter.DefaultBufferSize

member.summary: The combined size limit for headers per multipart section.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.MultipartReader.BodyLengthLimit
member.summary: The optional limit for the total response body length.

The boundary pattern to use.

member.summary: Creates a stream that reads until it reaches the given boundary pattern.

The boundary pattern to use.
The ArrayPool pool to use for temporary byte arrays.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.MultipartSection.BaseStreamOffset
member.summary: The position where the body starts in the total multipart body. This may not be available if the total multipart body is not seekable.

member.summary: Parse a query string into its component key and value parts.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.Resources.HttpRequestStreamReader_StreamNotReadable
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The stream must support reading..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.Resources.HttpResponseStreamWriter_StreamNotWritable
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The stream must support writing..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.Resources.WebEncoders_InvalidCountOffsetOrLength

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.WebEncoders
member.summary: Contains utility APIs to assist with common encoding and decoding operations.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.WebEncoders.Base64UrlDecode(System.String)
member.summary: Decodes a base64url-encoded string.
member.param: The base64url-encoded input to decode.
member.returns: The base64url-decoded form of the input.
member.remarks: The input must not contain any whitespace or padding characters. Throws if the input is malformed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.WebEncoders.Base64UrlDecode(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decodes a base64url-encoded substring of a given string.
member.param: A string containing the base64url-encoded input to decode.
The position in at which decoding should begin.
The number of characters in to decode.
member.returns: The base64url-decoded form of the input.
member.remarks: The input must not contain any whitespace or padding characters. Throws if the input is malformed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.WebEncoders.Base64UrlDecode(System.String,System.Int32,System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decodes a base64url-encoded into a byte[].
member.param: A string containing the base64url-encoded input to decode.
The position in at which decoding should begin.
Scratch buffer to hold the s to decode. Array must be large enough to hold and characters as well as Base64 padding characters. Content is not preserved.
The offset into at which to begin writing the s to decode.
The number of characters in to decode.
member.remarks: The input must not contain any whitespace or padding characters. Throws if the input is malformed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.WebEncoders.GetArraySizeRequiredToDecode(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the minimum char[] size required for decoding of characters with the method.
member.param: The number of characters to decode.
member.returns: The minimum char[] size required for decoding of characters.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.WebEncoders.Base64UrlEncode(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Encodes using base64url encoding.
member.param: The binary input to encode.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.WebEncoders.Base64UrlEncode(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes using base64url encoding.
member.param: The binary input to encode.
The offset into at which to begin encoding.
The number of bytes from to encode.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.WebEncoders.Base64UrlEncode(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes using base64url encoding.
member.param: The binary input to encode.
The offset into at which to begin encoding.
Buffer to receive the base64url-encoded form of . Array must be large enough to hold characters and the full base64-encoded form of , including padding characters.
The offset into at which to begin writing the base64url-encoded form of .
The number of bytes from to encode.
member.returns: The number of characters written to , less any padding characters.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities.WebEncoders.GetArraySizeRequiredToEncode(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the minimum output char[] size required for encoding s with the method.
member.param: The number of characters to encode.
member.returns: The minimum output char[] size required for encoding s.
